attachments.text: documentation on the products of Statistik Stadt Zürich

text: This might be useful to visualise what data is available <https://data.stadt-zuerich.ch/dataset>

*What is the data about?*
Today we release our Linked Open Statistical Data (LOSD) Project to the public!
We start with 3'924'445 triples. This is a small selection of our growing data offering. It contains mainly statistical data about the population of the City of Zurich.
*What is its granularity?*
Depending on the selected topic the granularity and the available time slices vary. All the data is aggregated and in the same quality as the one, that the statistical office publishes in its publications.
*What can the data be used for?*
Analytics and visualisations of many aspects of the city population and other topics.
Combine (link) it with other data.
Learn about the concepts of Linked Data and SPARQL with real local data.
might be interesting (if you still want to import these data sets in non-linked data format and integrate it in your data analysis tool):

text:
if you want to query using a jupyter notebook:
install with: conda install sparqlwrapper
get the python code here:
<https://query.wikidata.org/> > "examples" > select any example > run it > click on "<code>" > click on python
copy it to the notebook and run it.
you can change to point your query to the city of zurich's endpoint:
_sparql = SPARQLWrapper("<https://ld.stadt-zuerich.ch/sparql/>")_

Top! We could prepare a Notebook to show off some of the ZH data and/or create a website with Dash <https://dash.plot.ly/gallery>. Steps: query the ZH Linked Data DB, convert the results to a Pandas DataFrame, plot the data, ...

text: Topic: Pollution Dataset - I could not find Linked Data at ZRH or Swiss Level yet; however there is a CSV file with 2012 to today data for the 4 air quality control stations which we need to associate with "Quartier" <https://data.stadt-zuerich.ch/dataset/luftqualitaet-historisierte-messungen>

text: web GUI for this result on DBPEDIA is: <https://dbpedia.org/sparql?default-graph-uri=http%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org&query=SELECT+*+FROM+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%3E+WHERE+%7B+%0D%0A%3Fcity+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fproperty%2FleaderName%3E+%3FleaderName%0D%0A%7D+LIMIT+10&format=text%2Fhtml&CXML_redir_for_subjs=121&CXML_redir_for_hrefs=&timeout=30000&debug=on&run=+Run+Query+>

text: age: 80 years and older, 15 years or younger: <http://yasgui.org/short/H1IDLgywQ>
Latest Query for Linked Data re. Polution

PREFIX schema: <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/schema/>
PREFIX property: <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/property/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?year ?station ?type (AVG(?value) as ?AVGVALUE) WHERE {
     ?obs ?type ?value.
     ?obs schema:station ?station .
     #?station property:type "Traffic"^^xsd:string .
     ?obs schema:year ?year .
     ?year property:yearNum "2012"^^xsd:integer .
     {  ?station schema:inCity ?city .
         ?city schema:locatedIn ?country .
     } UNION {
         ?station schema:inCountry ?country .
     }
     ?obs schema:sensor ?sensor .
     ?sensor property:statisticShortName "Mean"^^xsd:string .
     ?country property:isoCode ?isocode .
      FILTER( ?isocode IN ("CH"^^xsd:string) )
      # Air Quality Station ZSS = Stampfenbachstrasse (6,7,8), ZBW = Schimmelstrasse (2,3,9), ZUE = Zurich Caserne (1,4,5,10), DUE = Dubendorf (11,12)
      FILTER( ?station IN (<http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/data/station/CH0013A_ZSS/> ,
                           <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/data/station/CH0021A_ZBW/>,
                           <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/data/station/CH0010A_ZUE/>,
                           <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/data/station/CH0005A_DUE/>) )

      FILTER( ?type IN (<http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/schema/NOX> ,
                        <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/schema/CO> ,
                        <http://qweb.cs.aau.dk/airbase/schema/PM10>) )

} GROUP BY ?station ?type ?year

attachments.title: Statistische Quartiere - CKAN
attachments.text: Die 34 Statistischen Quartiere basieren auf den Stadtquartieren und erhielten 1970 ihre heutige Einteilung. Dabei wurden die damals bevölkerungsmässig grössten sechs Stadtquartiere weiter unterteilt.
